040/** This class is for the ADIS16448 IMU that connects to the RoboRIO MXP port. */
041@SuppressWarnings({
042  "unused",
043  "PMD.RedundantFieldInitializer",
044  "PMD.ImmutableField",
045  "PMD.SingularField",
046  "PMD.CollapsibleIfStatements",
047  "PMD.MissingOverride",
048  "PMD.EmptyIfStmt",
049  "PMD.EmptyStatementNotInLoop"
050})
051public class ADIS16448_IMU implements Gyro, NTSendable {
052  /** ADIS16448 Register Map Declaration */
053  private static final int FLASH_CNT = 0x00; // Flash memory write count
054
055  private static final int XGYRO_OUT = 0x04; // X-axis gyroscope output
056  private static final int YGYRO_OUT = 0x06; // Y-axis gyroscope output
057  private static final int ZGYRO_OUT = 0x08; // Z-axis gyroscope output
058  private static final int XACCL_OUT = 0x0A; // X-axis accelerometer output
059  private static final int YACCL_OUT = 0x0C; // Y-axis accelerometer output
060  private static final int ZACCL_OUT = 0x0E; // Z-axis accelerometer output
061  private static final int XMAGN_OUT = 0x10; // X-axis magnetometer output
062  private static final int YMAGN_OUT = 0x12; // Y-axis magnetometer output
063  private static final int ZMAGN_OUT = 0x14; // Z-axis magnetometer output
064  private static final int BARO_OUT = 0x16; // Barometer pressure measurement, high word
065  private static final int TEMP_OUT = 0x18; // Temperature output
066  private static final int XGYRO_OFF = 0x1A; // X-axis gyroscope bias offset factor
067  private static final int YGYRO_OFF = 0x1C; // Y-axis gyroscope bias offset factor
068  private static final int ZGYRO_OFF = 0x1E; // Z-axis gyroscope bias offset factor
069  private static final int XACCL_OFF = 0x20; // X-axis acceleration bias offset factor
070  private static final int YACCL_OFF = 0x22; // Y-axis acceleration bias offset factor
071  private static final int ZACCL_OFF = 0x24; // Z-axis acceleration bias offset factor
072  private static final int XMAGN_HIC = 0x26; // X-axis magnetometer, hard iron factor
073  private static final int YMAGN_HIC = 0x28; // Y-axis magnetometer, hard iron factor
074  private static final int ZMAGN_HIC = 0x2A; // Z-axis magnetometer, hard iron factor
075  private static final int XMAGN_SIC = 0x2C; // X-axis magnetometer, soft iron factor
076  private static final int YMAGN_SIC = 0x2E; // Y-axis magnetometer, soft iron factor
077  private static final int ZMAGN_SIC = 0x30; // Z-axis magnetometer, soft iron factor
078  private static final int GPIO_CTRL = 0x32; // GPIO control
079  private static final int MSC_CTRL = 0x34; // MISC control
080  private static final int SMPL_PRD = 0x36; // Sample clock/Decimation filter control
081  private static final int SENS_AVG = 0x38; // Digital filter control
082  private static final int SEQ_CNT = 0x3A; // MAGN_OUT and BARO_OUT counter
083  private static final int DIAG_STAT = 0x3C; // System status
084  private static final int GLOB_CMD = 0x3E; // System command
085  private static final int ALM_MAG1 = 0x40; // Alarm 1 amplitude threshold
086  private static final int ALM_MAG2 = 0x42; // Alarm 2 amplitude threshold
087  private static final int ALM_SMPL1 = 0x44; // Alarm 1 sample size
088  private static final int ALM_SMPL2 = 0x46; // Alarm 2 sample size
089  private static final int ALM_CTRL = 0x48; // Alarm control
090  private static final int LOT_ID1 = 0x52; // Lot identification number
091  private static final int LOT_ID2 = 0x54; // Lot identification number
092  private static final int PROD_ID = 0x56; // Product identifier
093  private static final int SERIAL_NUM = 0x58; // Lot-specific serial number
094
095  public enum IMUAxis {
096    kX,
097    kY,
098    kZ
099  }
100
101  // * Static Constants */
102  private static final double rad_to_deg = 57.2957795;
103  private static final double deg_to_rad = 0.0174532;
104  private static final double grav = 9.81;
105
106  /* User-specified yaw axis */
107  private IMUAxis m_yaw_axis;
108
109  /* Offset data storage */
110  private double m_accum_gyro_x[];
111  private double m_accum_gyro_y[];
112  private double m_accum_gyro_z[];
113
114  /* Instant raw output variables */
115  private double m_gyro_x = 0.0;
116  private double m_gyro_y = 0.0;
117  private double m_gyro_z = 0.0;
118  private double m_accel_x = 0.0;
119  private double m_accel_y = 0.0;
120  private double m_accel_z = 0.0;
121  private double m_mag_x = 0.0;
122  private double m_mag_y = 0.0;
123  private double m_mag_z = 0.0;
124  private double m_baro = 0.0;
125  private double m_temp = 0.0;
126
127  /* IMU gyro offset variables */
128  private double m_gyro_offset_x = 0.0;
129  private double m_gyro_offset_y = 0.0;
130  private double m_gyro_offset_z = 0.0;
131  private int m_avg_size = 0;
132  private int m_accum_count = 0;
133
134  /* Integrated gyro angle variables */
135  private double m_integ_gyro_x = 0.0;
136  private double m_integ_gyro_y = 0.0;
137  private double m_integ_gyro_z = 0.0;
138
139  /* Complementary filter variables */
140  private double m_dt = 0.0;
141  private double m_alpha = 0.0;
142  private double m_tau = 1.0;
143  private double m_compAngleX = 0.0;
144  private double m_compAngleY = 0.0;
145  private double m_accelAngleX = 0.0;
146  private double m_accelAngleY = 0.0;
147
148  /* State variables */
149  private volatile boolean m_thread_active = false;
150  private int m_calibration_time = 0;
151  private volatile boolean m_first_run = true;
152  private volatile boolean m_thread_idle = false;
153  private boolean m_auto_configured = false;
154  private boolean m_start_up_mode = true;
155
156  /* Resources */
157  private SPI m_spi;
158  private SPI.Port m_spi_port;
159  private DigitalInput m_auto_interrupt;
160  private DigitalOutput m_reset_out;
161  private DigitalInput m_reset_in;
162  private DigitalOutput m_status_led;
163  private Thread m_acquire_task;
164
165  /* CRC-16 Look-Up Table */
166  int adiscrc[] =
167      new int[] {
168        0x0000, 0x17CE, 0x0FDF, 0x1811, 0x1FBE, 0x0870, 0x1061, 0x07AF,
169        0x1F3F, 0x08F1, 0x10E0, 0x072E, 0x0081, 0x174F, 0x0F5E, 0x1890,
170        0x1E3D, 0x09F3, 0x11E2, 0x062C, 0x0183, 0x164D, 0x0E5C, 0x1992,
171        0x0102, 0x16CC, 0x0EDD, 0x1913, 0x1EBC, 0x0972, 0x1163, 0x06AD,
172        0x1C39, 0x0BF7, 0x13E6, 0x0428, 0x0387, 0x1449, 0x0C58, 0x1B96,
173        0x0306, 0x14C8, 0x0CD9, 0x1B17, 0x1CB8, 0x0B76, 0x1367, 0x04A9,
174        0x0204, 0x15CA, 0x0DDB, 0x1A15, 0x1DBA, 0x0A74, 0x1265, 0x05AB,
175        0x1D3B, 0x0AF5, 0x12E4, 0x052A, 0x0285, 0x154B, 0x0D5A, 0x1A94,
176        0x1831, 0x0FFF, 0x17EE, 0x0020, 0x078F, 0x1041, 0x0850, 0x1F9E,

179        0x1933, 0x0EFD, 0x16EC, 0x0122, 0x068D, 0x1143, 0x0952, 0x1E9C,
180        0x0408, 0x13C6, 0x0BD7, 0x1C19, 0x1BB6, 0x0C78, 0x1469, 0x03A7,
181        0x1B37, 0x0CF9, 0x14E8, 0x0326, 0x0489, 0x1347, 0x0B56, 0x1C98,

185        0x0F1E, 0x18D0, 0x00C1, 0x170F, 0x10A0, 0x076E, 0x1F7F, 0x08B1,
186        0x0E1C, 0x19D2, 0x01C3, 0x160D, 0x11A2, 0x066C, 0x1E7D, 0x09B3,
187        0x1123, 0x06ED, 0x1EFC, 0x0932, 0x0E9D, 0x1953, 0x0142, 0x168C,
188        0x0C18, 0x1BD6, 0x03C7, 0x1409, 0x13A6, 0x0468, 0x1C79, 0x0BB7,
189        0x1327, 0x04E9, 0x1CF8, 0x0B36, 0x0C99, 0x1B57, 0x0346, 0x1488,
190        0x1225, 0x05EB, 0x1DFA, 0x0A34, 0x0D9B, 0x1A55, 0x0244, 0x158A,
191        0x0D1A, 0x1AD4, 0x02C5, 0x150B, 0x12A4, 0x056A, 0x1D7B, 0x0AB5,
192        0x0810, 0x1FDE, 0x07CF, 0x1001, 0x17AE, 0x0060, 0x1871, 0x0FBF,
193        0x172F, 0x00E1, 0x18F0, 0x0F3E, 0x0891, 0x1F5F, 0x074E, 0x1080,

195        0x0912, 0x1EDC, 0x06CD, 0x1103, 0x16AC, 0x0162, 0x1973, 0x0EBD,

197        0x0B16, 0x1CD8, 0x04C9, 0x1307, 0x14A8, 0x0366, 0x1B77, 0x0CB9,
198        0x0A14, 0x1DDA, 0x05CB, 0x1205, 0x15AA, 0x0264, 0x1A75, 0x0DBB,
199        0x152B, 0x02E5, 0x1AF4, 0x0D3A, 0x0A95, 0x1D5B, 0x054A, 0x1284
200      };
201
202  private static class AcquireTask implements Runnable {
203    private final ADIS16448_IMU imu;
204
205    public AcquireTask(final ADIS16448_IMU imu) {
206      this.imu = imu;
207    }
208
209    @Override
210    public void run() {
211      imu.acquire();
212    }
213  }
214
215  public ADIS16448_IMU() {
216    this(IMUAxis.kZ, SPI.Port.kMXP, 4);
217  }
218
219  /**
220   * @param yaw_axis The axis that measures the yaw
221   * @param port The SPI Port the gyro is plugged into
222   * @param cal_time Calibration time
223   */
224  public ADIS16448_IMU(final IMUAxis yaw_axis, SPI.Port port, int cal_time) {
225    m_yaw_axis = yaw_axis;
226    m_spi_port = port;
227
228    m_acquire_task = new Thread(new AcquireTask(this));
229
230    // Force the IMU reset pin to toggle on startup (doesn't require DS enable)
231    m_reset_out = new DigitalOutput(18); // Drive MXP DIO8 low
232    Timer.delay(0.01); // Wait 10ms
233    m_reset_out.close();
234    m_reset_in = new DigitalInput(18); // Set MXP DIO8 high
235    Timer.delay(0.25); // Wait 250ms
236
237    configCalTime(cal_time);
238
239    if (!switchToStandardSPI()) {
240      return;
241    }
242
243    // Set IMU internal decimation to 819.2 SPS
244    writeRegister(SMPL_PRD, 0x0001);
245    // Enable Data Ready (LOW = Good Data) on DIO1 (PWM0 on MXP)
246    writeRegister(MSC_CTRL, 0x0016);
247    // Disable IMU internal Bartlett filter
248    writeRegister(SENS_AVG, 0x0400);
249    // Clear offset registers
250    writeRegister(XGYRO_OFF, 0x0000);
251    writeRegister(YGYRO_OFF, 0x0000);
252    writeRegister(ZGYRO_OFF, 0x0000);
253
254    // Configure standard SPI
255    if (!switchToAutoSPI()) {
256      return;
257    }
258    // Notify DS that IMU calibration delay is active
259    DriverStation.reportWarning(
260        "ADIS16448 IMU Detected. Starting initial calibration delay.", false);
261    // Wait for whatever time the user set as the start-up delay
262    try {
263      Thread.sleep((long) (m_calibration_time * 1.2 * 1000));
264    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
265    }
266    // Execute calibration routine
267    calibrate();
268    // Reset accumulated offsets
269    reset();
270    // Tell the acquire loop that we're done starting up
271    m_start_up_mode = false;
272    // Let the user know the IMU was initiallized successfully
273    DriverStation.reportWarning("ADIS16448 IMU Successfully Initialized!", false);
274    // Drive MXP PWM5 (IMU ready LED) low (active low)
275    m_status_led = new DigitalOutput(19);
276    // Report usage and post data to DS
277    HAL.report(tResourceType.kResourceType_ADIS16448, 0);
278  }
279
280  /** */
281  private static int toUShort(byte[] buf) {
282    return (((buf[0] & 0xFF) << 8) + ((buf[1] & 0xFF) << 0));
283  }
284
285  private static int toUByte(int... buf) {
286    return (buf[0] & 0xFF);
287  }
288
289  public static int toUShort(int... buf) {
290    return (((buf[0] & 0xFF) << 8) + (buf[1] & 0xFF));
291  }
292
293  /** */
294  private static long toULong(int sint) {
295    return sint & 0x00000000FFFFFFFFL;
296  }
297
298  /** */
299  private static int toShort(int... buf) {
300    return (short) (((buf[0] & 0xFF) << 8) + ((buf[1] & 0xFF) << 0));
301  }
302
303  /** */
304  private static int toInt(int... buf) {
305    return (int)
306        ((buf[0] & 0xFF) << 24 | (buf[1] & 0xFF) << 16 | (buf[2] & 0xFF) << 8 | (buf[3] & 0xFF));
307  }
308
309  /** */
310  private boolean switchToStandardSPI() {
311    // Check to see whether the acquire thread is active. If so, wait for it to stop
312    // producing data.
313    if (m_thread_active) {
314      m_thread_active = false;
315      while (!m_thread_idle) {
316        try {
317          Thread.sleep(10);
318        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
319        }
320      }
321      System.out.println("Paused the IMU processing thread successfully!");
322      // Maybe we're in auto SPI mode? If so, kill auto SPI, and then SPI.
323      if (m_spi != null && m_auto_configured) {
324        m_spi.stopAuto();
325        // We need to get rid of all the garbage left in the auto SPI buffer after
326        // stopping it.
327        // Sometimes data magically reappears, so we have to check the buffer size a
328        // couple of times
329        // to be sure we got it all. Yuck.
330        int[] trashBuffer = new int[200];
331        try {
332          Thread.sleep(100);
333        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
334        }
335        int data_count = m_spi.readAutoReceivedData(trashBuffer, 0, 0);
336        while (data_count > 0) {
337          /* Dequeue 200 at a time, or the remainder of the buffer if less than 200 */
338          m_spi.readAutoReceivedData(trashBuffer, Math.min(200, data_count), 0);
339          /* Update remaining buffer count */
340          data_count = m_spi.readAutoReceivedData(trashBuffer, 0, 0);
341        }
342        System.out.println("Paused auto SPI successfully.");
343      }
344    }
345    // There doesn't seem to be a SPI port active. Let's try to set one up
346    if (m_spi == null) {
347      System.out.println("Setting up a new SPI port.");
348      m_spi = new SPI(m_spi_port);
349      m_spi.setClockRate(1000000);
350      m_spi.setMSBFirst();
351      m_spi.setSampleDataOnTrailingEdge();
352      m_spi.setClockActiveLow();
353      m_spi.setChipSelectActiveLow();
354      readRegister(PROD_ID); // Dummy read
355
356      // Validate the product ID
357      if (readRegister(PROD_ID) != 16448) {
358        DriverStation.reportError("Could not find ADIS16448", false);
359        close();
360        return false;
361      }
362      return true;
363    } else {
364      // Maybe the SPI port is active, but not in auto SPI mode? Try to read the
365      // product ID.
366      readRegister(PROD_ID); // dummy read
367      if (readRegister(PROD_ID) != 16448) {
368        DriverStation.reportError("Could not find an ADIS16448", false);
369        close();
370        return false;
371      } else {
372        return true;
373      }
374    }
375  }
376
377  /** */
378  boolean switchToAutoSPI() {
379    // No SPI port has been set up. Go set one up first.
380    if (m_spi == null) {
381      if (!switchToStandardSPI()) {
382        DriverStation.reportError("Failed to start/restart auto SPI", false);
383        return false;
384      }
385    }
386    // Only set up the interrupt if needed.
387    if (m_auto_interrupt == null) {
388      m_auto_interrupt = new DigitalInput(10); // MXP DIO0
389    }
390    // The auto SPI controller gets angry if you try to set up two instances on one
391    // bus.
392    if (!m_auto_configured) {
393      m_spi.initAuto(8200);
394      m_auto_configured = true;
395    }
396    // Set auto SPI packet data and size
397    m_spi.setAutoTransmitData(new byte[] {GLOB_CMD}, 27);
398    // Configure auto stall time
399    m_spi.configureAutoStall(100, 1000, 255);
400    // Kick off auto SPI (Note: Device configration impossible after auto SPI is
401    // activated)
402    m_spi.startAutoTrigger(m_auto_interrupt, true, false);
403
404    // Check to see if the acquire thread is running. If not, kick one off.
405    if (!m_acquire_task.isAlive()) {
406      m_first_run = true;
407      m_thread_active = true;
408      m_acquire_task.start();
409      System.out.println("New IMU Processing thread activated!");
410    } else {
411      // The thread was running, re-init run variables and start it up again.
412      m_first_run = true;
413      m_thread_active = true;
414      System.out.println("Old IMU Processing thread re-activated!");
415    }
416    // Looks like the thread didn't start for some reason. Abort.
417    if (!m_acquire_task.isAlive()) {
418      DriverStation.reportError("Failed to start/restart the acquire() thread.", false);
419      close();
420      return false;
421    }
422    return true;
423  }
424
425  public int configDecRate(int m_decRate) {
426    int writeValue = m_decRate;
427    int readbackValue;
428    if (!switchToStandardSPI()) {
429      DriverStation.reportError("Failed to configure/reconfigure standard SPI.", false);
430      return 2;
431    }
432
433    /* Check max */
434    if (m_decRate > 9) {
435      DriverStation.reportError(
436          "Attemted to write an invalid decimation value. Capping at 9", false);
437      m_decRate = 9;
438    }
439    if (m_decRate < 0) {
440      DriverStation.reportError(
441          "Attemted to write an invalid decimation value. Capping at 0", false);
442      m_decRate = 0;
443    }
444
445    /* Shift decimation setting to correct position and select internal sync */
446    writeValue = (m_decRate << 8) | 0x1;
447
448    /* Apply to IMU */
449    writeRegister(SMPL_PRD, writeValue);
450
451    /* Perform read back to verify write */
452    readbackValue = readRegister(SMPL_PRD);
453
454    /* Throw error for invalid write */
455    if (readbackValue != writeValue) {
456      DriverStation.reportError("ADIS16448 SMPL_PRD write failed.", false);
457    }
458
459    if (!switchToAutoSPI()) {
460      DriverStation.reportError("Failed to configure/reconfigure auto SPI.", false);
461      return 2;
462    }
463    return 0;
464  }
465
466  /**
467   * Configures calibration time
468   *
469   * @param new_cal_time New calibration time
470   * @return 1 if the new calibration time is the same as the current one else 0
471   */
472  public int configCalTime(int new_cal_time) {
473    if (m_calibration_time == new_cal_time) {
474      return 1;
475    } else {
476      m_calibration_time = new_cal_time;
477      m_avg_size = m_calibration_time * 819;
478      initOffsetBuffer(m_avg_size);
479      return 0;
480    }
481  }
482
483  private void initOffsetBuffer(int size) {
484    // Avoid exceptions in the case of bad arguments
485    if (size < 1) {
486      size = 1;
487    }
488    // Set average size to size (correct bad values)
489    m_avg_size = size;
490    synchronized (this) {
491      // Resize vector
492      m_accum_gyro_x = new double[size];
493      m_accum_gyro_y = new double[size];
494      m_accum_gyro_z = new double[size];
495      // Set acculumate count to 0
496      m_accum_count = 0;
497    }
498  }
499
500  /** {@inheritDoc} */
501  @Override
502  public void calibrate() {
503    synchronized (this) {
504      int gyroAverageSize = Math.min(m_accum_count, m_avg_size);
505      double m_gyro_accum_x = 0.0;
506      double m_gyro_accum_y = 0.0;
507      double m_gyro_accum_z = 0.0;
508      for (int i = 0; i < gyroAverageSize; i++) {
509        m_gyro_accum_x += m_accum_gyro_x[i];
510        m_gyro_accum_y += m_accum_gyro_y[i];
511        m_gyro_accum_z += m_accum_gyro_z[i];
512      }
513      m_gyro_offset_x = m_gyro_accum_x / gyroAverageSize;
514      m_gyro_offset_y = m_gyro_accum_y / gyroAverageSize;
515      m_gyro_offset_z = m_gyro_accum_z / gyroAverageSize;
516      m_integ_gyro_x = 0.0;
517      m_integ_gyro_y = 0.0;
518      m_integ_gyro_z = 0.0;
519      // System.out.println("Avg Size: " + gyroAverageSize + "X Off: " +
520      // m_gyro_offset_x + "Y Off: " + m_gyro_offset_y + "Z Off: " + m_gyro_offset_z);
521    }
522  }
523
524  /**
525   * Sets the yaw axis
526   *
527   * @param yaw_axis The new yaw axis to use
528   * @return 1 if the new yaw axis is the same as the current one else 0.
529   */
530  public int setYawAxis(IMUAxis yaw_axis) {
531    if (m_yaw_axis == yaw_axis) {
532      return 1;
533    }
534    m_yaw_axis = yaw_axis;
535    reset();
536    return 0;
537  }
538
539  private int readRegister(final int reg) {
540    // ByteBuffer buf = ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(2);
541    final byte[] buf = new byte[2];
542    // buf.order(ByteOrder.BIG_ENDIAN);
543    buf[0] = (byte) (reg & 0x7f);
544    buf[1] = (byte) 0;
545
546    m_spi.write(buf, 2);
547    m_spi.read(false, buf, 2);
548
549    return toUShort(buf);
550  }
551
552  private void writeRegister(final int reg, final int val) {
553    final byte[] buf = new byte[2];
554    // low byte
555    buf[0] = (byte) (0x80 | reg);
556    buf[1] = (byte) (val & 0xff);
557    m_spi.write(buf, 2);
558    // high byte
559    buf[0] = (byte) (0x81 | reg);
560    buf[1] = (byte) (val >> 8);
561    m_spi.write(buf, 2);
562  }
563
564  /** {@inheritDoc} */
565  public void reset() {
566    synchronized (this) {
567      m_integ_gyro_x = 0.0;
568      m_integ_gyro_y = 0.0;
569      m_integ_gyro_z = 0.0;
570    }
571  }
572
573  /** Delete (free) the spi port used for the IMU. */
574  @Override
575  public void close() {
576    if (m_thread_active) {
577      m_thread_active = false;
578      try {
579        if (m_acquire_task != null) {
580          m_acquire_task.join();
581          m_acquire_task = null;
582        }
583      } catch (InterruptedException e) {
584      }
585      if (m_spi != null) {
586        if (m_auto_configured) {
587          m_spi.stopAuto();
588        }
589        m_spi.close();
590        m_auto_configured = false;
591        if (m_auto_interrupt != null) {
592          m_auto_interrupt.close();
593          m_auto_interrupt = null;
594        }
595        m_spi = null;
596      }
597    }
598    System.out.println("Finished cleaning up after the IMU driver.");
599  }
600
601  /** */
602  private void acquire() {
603    // Set data packet length
604    final int dataset_len = 29; // 18 data points + timestamp
605    final int BUFFER_SIZE = 4000;
606
607    // Set up buffers and variables
608    int[] buffer = new int[BUFFER_SIZE];
609    int data_count = 0;
610    int data_remainder = 0;
611    int data_to_read = 0;
612    int bufferAvgIndex = 0;
613    double previous_timestamp = 0.0;
614    double delta_angle = 0.0;
615    double gyro_x = 0.0;
616    double gyro_y = 0.0;
617    double gyro_z = 0.0;
618    double accel_x = 0.0;
619    double accel_y = 0.0;
620    double accel_z = 0.0;
621    double mag_x = 0.0;
622    double mag_y = 0.0;
623    double mag_z = 0.0;
624    double baro = 0.0;
625    double temp = 0.0;
626    double gyro_x_si = 0.0;
627    double gyro_y_si = 0.0;
628    double gyro_z_si = 0.0;
629    double accel_x_si = 0.0;
630    double accel_y_si = 0.0;
631    double accel_z_si = 0.0;
632    double compAngleX = 0.0;
633    double compAngleY = 0.0;
634    double accelAngleX = 0.0;
635    double accelAngleY = 0.0;
636
637    while (true) {
638      // Sleep loop for 5ms
639      try {
640        Thread.sleep(5);
641      } catch (InterruptedException e) {
642      }
643
644      if (m_thread_active) {
645        m_thread_idle = false;
646
647        data_count =
648            m_spi.readAutoReceivedData(
649                buffer, 0, 0); // Read number of bytes currently stored in the buffer
650        data_remainder =
651            data_count % dataset_len; // Check if frame is incomplete. Add 1 because of timestamp
652        data_to_read = data_count - data_remainder; // Remove incomplete data from read count
653        if (data_to_read > BUFFER_SIZE) {
654          DriverStation.reportWarning(
655              "ADIS16448 data processing thread overrun has occurred!", false);
656          data_to_read = BUFFER_SIZE - (BUFFER_SIZE % dataset_len);
657        }
658        m_spi.readAutoReceivedData(
659            buffer, data_to_read, 0); // Read data from DMA buffer (only complete sets)
660
661        // Could be multiple data sets in the buffer. Handle each one.
662        for (int i = 0; i < data_to_read; i += dataset_len) {
663          // Calculate CRC-16 on each data packet
664          int calc_crc = 0x0000FFFF; // Starting word
665          int read_byte = 0;
666          int imu_crc = 0;
667          for (int k = 5;
668              k < 27;
669              k += 2) { // Cycle through XYZ GYRO, XYZ ACCEL, XYZ MAG, BARO, TEMP (Ignore Status &
670            // CRC)
671            read_byte = buffer[i + k + 1]; // Process LSB
672            calc_crc = (calc_crc >>> 8) ^ adiscrc[(calc_crc & 0x000000FF) ^ read_byte];
673            read_byte = buffer[i + k]; // Process MSB
674            calc_crc = (calc_crc >>> 8) ^ adiscrc[(calc_crc & 0x000000FF) ^ read_byte];
675          }
676          calc_crc = ~calc_crc & 0xFFFF; // Complement
677          calc_crc = ((calc_crc << 8) | (calc_crc >> 8)) & 0xFFFF; // Flip LSB & MSB
678          imu_crc = toUShort(buffer[i + 27], buffer[i + 28]); // Extract DUT CRC from data buffer
679
680          if (calc_crc == imu_crc) {
681            // Timestamp is at buffer[i]
682            m_dt = ((double) buffer[i] - previous_timestamp) / 1000000.0;
683
684            // Scale sensor data
685            gyro_x = (toShort(buffer[i + 5], buffer[i + 6]) * 0.04);
686            gyro_y = (toShort(buffer[i + 7], buffer[i + 8]) * 0.04);
687            gyro_z = (toShort(buffer[i + 9], buffer[i + 10]) * 0.04);
688            accel_x = (toShort(buffer[i + 11], buffer[i + 12]) * 0.833);
689            accel_y = (toShort(buffer[i + 13], buffer[i + 14]) * 0.833);
690            accel_z = (toShort(buffer[i + 15], buffer[i + 16]) * 0.833);
691            mag_x = (toShort(buffer[i + 17], buffer[i + 18]) * 0.1429);
692            mag_y = (toShort(buffer[i + 19], buffer[i + 20]) * 0.1429);
693            mag_z = (toShort(buffer[i + 21], buffer[i + 22]) * 0.1429);
694            baro = (toShort(buffer[i + 23], buffer[i + 24]) * 0.02);
695            temp = (toShort(buffer[i + 25], buffer[i + 26]) * 0.07386 + 31.0);
696
697            // Convert scaled sensor data to SI units (for tilt calculations)
698            // TODO: Should the unit outputs be selectable?
699            gyro_x_si = gyro_x * deg_to_rad;
700            gyro_y_si = gyro_y * deg_to_rad;
701            gyro_z_si = gyro_z * deg_to_rad;
702            accel_x_si = accel_x * grav;
703            accel_y_si = accel_y * grav;
704            accel_z_si = accel_z * grav;
705            // Store timestamp for next iteration
706            previous_timestamp = buffer[i];
707            // Calculate alpha for use with the complementary filter
708            m_alpha = m_tau / (m_tau + m_dt);
709            // Calculate complementary filter
710            if (m_first_run) {
711              // Set up inclinometer calculations for first run
712              accelAngleX =
713                  Math.atan2(
714                      -accel_x_si,
715                      Math.sqrt((accel_y_si * accel_y_si) + (-accel_z_si * -accel_z_si)));
716              accelAngleY =
717                  Math.atan2(
718                      accel_y_si,
719                      Math.sqrt((-accel_x_si * -accel_x_si) + (-accel_z_si * -accel_z_si)));
720              compAngleX = accelAngleX;
721              compAngleY = accelAngleY;
722            } else {
723              // Run inclinometer calculations
724              accelAngleX =
725                  Math.atan2(
726                      -accel_x_si,
727                      Math.sqrt((accel_y_si * accel_y_si) + (-accel_z_si * -accel_z_si)));
728              accelAngleY =
729                  Math.atan2(
730                      accel_y_si,
731                      Math.sqrt((-accel_x_si * -accel_x_si) + (-accel_z_si * -accel_z_si)));
732              accelAngleX = formatAccelRange(accelAngleX, -accel_z_si);
733              accelAngleY = formatAccelRange(accelAngleY, -accel_z_si);
734              compAngleX = compFilterProcess(compAngleX, accelAngleX, -gyro_y_si);
735              compAngleY = compFilterProcess(compAngleY, accelAngleY, -gyro_x_si);
736            }
737
738            // Update global variables and state
739            synchronized (this) {
740              // Ignore first, integrated sample
741              if (m_first_run) {
742                m_integ_gyro_x = 0.0;
743                m_integ_gyro_y = 0.0;
744                m_integ_gyro_z = 0.0;
745              } else {
746                // Accumulate gyro for offset calibration
747                // Add to buffer
748                bufferAvgIndex = m_accum_count % m_avg_size;
749                m_accum_gyro_x[bufferAvgIndex] = gyro_x;
750                m_accum_gyro_y[bufferAvgIndex] = gyro_y;
751                m_accum_gyro_z[bufferAvgIndex] = gyro_z;
752                // Increment counter
753                m_accum_count++;
754              }
755              if (!m_start_up_mode) {
756                m_gyro_x = gyro_x;
757                m_gyro_y = gyro_y;
758                m_gyro_z = gyro_z;
759                m_accel_x = accel_x;
760                m_accel_y = accel_y;
761                m_accel_z = accel_z;
762                m_mag_x = mag_x;
763                m_mag_y = mag_y;
764                m_mag_z = mag_z;
765                m_baro = baro;
766                m_temp = temp;
767                m_compAngleX = compAngleX * rad_to_deg;
768                m_compAngleY = compAngleY * rad_to_deg;
769                m_accelAngleX = accelAngleX * rad_to_deg;
770                m_accelAngleY = accelAngleY * rad_to_deg;
771                // Accumulate gyro for angle integration and publish to global variables
772                m_integ_gyro_x += (gyro_x - m_gyro_offset_x) * m_dt;
773                m_integ_gyro_y += (gyro_y - m_gyro_offset_y) * m_dt;
774                m_integ_gyro_z += (gyro_z - m_gyro_offset_z) * m_dt;
775              }
776              // System.out.println("Good CRC");
777            }
778            m_first_run = false;
779          } else {
780            // System.out.println("Bad CRC");
781            /*
782             * System.out.println("Calc CRC: " + calc_crc);
783             * System.out.println("IMU CRC: " + imu_crc);
784             * System.out.println(
785             * buffer[i] + " " +
786             * (buffer[i + 1]) + " " + (buffer[i + 2]) + " " +
787             * (buffer[i + 3]) + " " + (buffer[i + 4]) + " " +
788             * (buffer[i + 5]) + " " + (buffer[i + 6]) + " " +
789             * (buffer[i + 7]) + " " + (buffer[i + 8]) + " " +
790             * (buffer[i + 9]) + " " + (buffer[i + 10]) + " " +
791             * (buffer[i + 11]) + " " + (buffer[i + 12]) + " " +
792             * (buffer[i + 13]) + " " + (buffer[i + 14]) + " " +
793             * (buffer[i + 15]) + " " + (buffer[i + 16]) + " " +
794             * (buffer[i + 17]) + " " + (buffer[i + 18]) + " " +
795             * (buffer[i + 19]) + " " + (buffer[i + 20]) + " " +
796             * (buffer[i + 21]) + " " + (buffer[i + 22]) + " " +
797             * (buffer[i + 23]) + " " + (buffer[i + 24]) + " " +
798             * (buffer[i + 25]) + " " + (buffer[i + 26]) + " " +
799             * (buffer[i + 27]) + " " + (buffer[i + 28]));
800             */
801          }
802        }
803      } else {
804        m_thread_idle = true;
805        data_count = 0;
806        data_remainder = 0;
807        data_to_read = 0;
808        previous_timestamp = 0.0;
809        delta_angle = 0.0;
810        gyro_x = 0.0;
811        gyro_y = 0.0;
812        gyro_z = 0.0;
813        accel_x = 0.0;
814        accel_y = 0.0;
815        accel_z = 0.0;
816        mag_x = 0.0;
817        mag_y = 0.0;
818        mag_z = 0.0;
819        baro = 0.0;
820        temp = 0.0;
821        gyro_x_si = 0.0;
822        gyro_y_si = 0.0;
823        gyro_z_si = 0.0;
824        accel_x_si = 0.0;
825        accel_y_si = 0.0;
826        accel_z_si = 0.0;
827        compAngleX = 0.0;
828        compAngleY = 0.0;
829        accelAngleX = 0.0;
830        accelAngleY = 0.0;
831      }
832    }
833  }
834
835  /**
836   * @param compAngle
837   * @param accAngle
838   * @return
839   */
840  private double formatFastConverge(double compAngle, double accAngle) {
841    if (compAngle > accAngle + Math.PI) {
842      compAngle = compAngle - 2.0 * Math.PI;
843    } else if (accAngle > compAngle + Math.PI) {
844      compAngle = compAngle + 2.0 * Math.PI;
845    }
846    return compAngle;
847  }
848
849  /**
850   * @param compAngle
851   * @return
852   */
853  private double formatRange0to2PI(double compAngle) {
854    while (compAngle >= 2 * Math.PI) {
855      compAngle = compAngle - 2.0 * Math.PI;
856    }
857    while (compAngle < 0.0) {
858      compAngle = compAngle + 2.0 * Math.PI;
859    }
860    return compAngle;
861  }
862
863  /**
864   * @param accelAngle
865   * @param accelZ
866   * @return
867   */
868  private double formatAccelRange(double accelAngle, double accelZ) {
869    if (accelZ < 0.0) {
870      accelAngle = Math.PI - accelAngle;
871    } else if (accelZ > 0.0 && accelAngle < 0.0) {
872      accelAngle = 2.0 * Math.PI + accelAngle;
873    }
874    return accelAngle;
875  }
876
877  /**
878   * @param compAngle
879   * @param accelAngle
880   * @param omega
881   * @return
882   */
883  private double compFilterProcess(double compAngle, double accelAngle, double omega) {
884    compAngle = formatFastConverge(compAngle, accelAngle);
885    compAngle = m_alpha * (compAngle + omega * m_dt) + (1.0 - m_alpha) * accelAngle;
886    compAngle = formatRange0to2PI(compAngle);
887    if (compAngle > Math.PI) {
888      compAngle = compAngle - 2.0 * Math.PI;
889    }
890    return compAngle;
891  }
892
893  /** */
894  public synchronized double getAngle() {
895    switch (m_yaw_axis) {
896      case kX:
897        return getGyroAngleX();
898      case kY:
899        return getGyroAngleY();
900      case kZ:
901        return getGyroAngleZ();
902      default:
903        return 0.0;
904    }
905  }
906
907  /** */
908  public synchronized double getRate() {
909    switch (m_yaw_axis) {
910      case kX:
911        return getGyroInstantX();
912      case kY:
913        return getGyroInstantY();
914      case kZ:
915        return getGyroInstantZ();
916      default:
917        return 0.0;
918    }
919  }
920
921  /** @return Yaw Axis */
922  public IMUAxis getYawAxis() {
923    return m_yaw_axis;
924  }
925
926  /** @return accumulated gyro angle in the X axis */
927  public synchronized double getGyroAngleX() {
928    return m_integ_gyro_x;
929  }
930
931  /** @return accumulated gyro angle in the Y axis */
932  public synchronized double getGyroAngleY() {
933    return m_integ_gyro_y;
934  }
935
936  /** @return accumulated gyro angle in the Z axis */
937  public synchronized double getGyroAngleZ() {
938    return m_integ_gyro_z;
939  }
940

942  public synchronized double getGyroInstantX() {
943    return m_gyro_x;
944  }
945
946  /** @return current gyro angle in the Y axis */
947  public synchronized double getGyroInstantY() {
948    return m_gyro_y;
949  }

952  public synchronized double getGyroInstantZ() {
953    return m_gyro_z;
954  }

957  public synchronized double getAccelInstantX() {
958    return m_accel_x;
959  }

961  /** @return current acceleration in the Y axis */
962  public synchronized double getAccelInstantY() {
963    return m_accel_y;
964  }
965
966  /** @return current acceleration in the Z axis */
967  public synchronized double getAccelInstantZ() {
968    return m_accel_z;
969  }

972  public synchronized double getMagInstantX() {
973    return m_mag_x;
974  }
975

977  public synchronized double getMagInstantY() {
978    return m_mag_y;
979  }
980

982  public synchronized double getMagInstantZ() {
983    return m_mag_z;
984  }

987  public synchronized double getXComplementaryAngle() {
988    return m_compAngleX;
989  }

992  public synchronized double getYComplementaryAngle() {
993    return m_compAngleY;
994  }

997  public synchronized double getXFilteredAccelAngle() {
998    return m_accelAngleX;
999  }

1002  public synchronized double getYFilteredAccelAngle() {
1003    return m_accelAngleY;
1004  }

1007  public synchronized double getBarometricPressure() {
1008    return m_baro;
1009  }
1010

1012  public synchronized double getTemperature() {
1013    return m_temp;
1014  }
1015
1016  @Override
1017  public void initSendable(NTSendableBuilder builder) {
1018    builder.setSmartDashboardType("Gyro");
1019    builder.addDoubleProperty("Value", this::getAngle, null);
1020  }
1021}
